quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Research is what I’m doing when I don’t know what I’m doing.
author: Wernher von Braun

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared; it is only to be understood.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Science knows no country, because knowledge belongs to humanity.
author: Louis Pasteur

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Research is formalized curiosity. It is poking and prying with a purpose.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Science is the great antidote to the poison of enthusiasm and superstition.
author: Adam Smith

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The good thing about science is that it's true whether or not you believe in it.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Technology is best when it brings people together.
author: Matt Mullenweg

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Science is a way of thinking much more than it is a body of knowledge.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Sometimes it is the people no one can imagine anything of who do the things no one can imagine.
author: Alan Turing

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The most damaging phrase in the language is: ‘It’s always been done that way.’
author: Grace Hopper

quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
author: Jane Goodall

quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
author: Estée Lauder

quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Work hard in silence. Let success make the noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.
author: Edward Teller

quote: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.
author: Christian Lous Lange

quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
author: Harry Golden

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Big ideas often start small.
author: Unknown

quote: There’s no shortage of remarkable ideas, what’s missing is the will to execute them.
author: Seth Godin

quote: Everything is theoretically impossible, until it is done.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Dream big. Start small. Act now.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Science is not only a disciple of reason but also one of romance and passion.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Great things never came from comfort zones.
author: Unknown

quote: Technology like art is a soaring exercise of the human imagination.
author: Daniel Bell

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Curiosity is the essence of our existence.
author: Gene Cernan

quote: The universe doesn’t allow perfection.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Technology is nothing. What’s important is that you have a faith in people.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Equipped with his five senses, man explores the universe around him.
author: Edwin Hubble

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do.
author: B.F. Skinner

quote: It’s not about ideas. It’s about making ideas happen.
author: Scott Belsky

quote: Every great advance in science has issued from a new audacity of imagination.
author: John Dewey

quote: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Science is magic that works.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Technology is best used when it enhances human potential.
author: Unknown

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: What new technology does is create new opportunities to do a job that customers want done.
author: Tim O’Reilly

quote: The beginning of knowledge is the discovery of something we do not understand.
author: Frank Herbert

quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Science and everyday life cannot and should not be separated.
author: Rosalind Franklin

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If something is important enough, even if the odds are against you, you should still do it.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: Exploration is in our nature. We began as wanderers, and we are wanderers still.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Technology over technique produces emotionless design.
author: Daniel Mall

quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Science is the poetry of reality.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: We live in a society exquisitely dependent on science and technology.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Science is the key to our future, and if you don’t believe in science, then you’re holding everybody back.
author: Bill Nye

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Computers are useless. They can only give you answers.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The sky is not the limit — it's only the beginning.
author: Unknown
